backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, study tasks, focus sessions, chat history, and career roadmaps with access-controlled queries and helper functions for dashboard and focus stats.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented product features with associated source files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend React components, pages, and utilities related to focus tracking, planning, chat, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack router with public, auth, and protected app routes and wraps the app with a theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/assistant/ChatCo: A chat input form with textarea, send button, keyboard shortcuts, and disabled/loading states.
frontend/src/components/assistant/ChatTh: Renders a scrollable list of user and AI chat messages with timestamps and icons.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Prompt: Displays preset prompt buttons that insert predefined AI-assistant prompts when selected.
frontend/src/components/assistant/QuickA: A card UI allowing users to submit a question to the AI assistant, handling quota checks, mock responses, and upgrade prompts.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Upgrad: A dialog prompting users to upgrade to Pro, triggering an upgrade mutation and listing plan benefits.
frontend/src/components/auth/LogoutButto: A button that clears Internet Identity data, resets react-query cache, and navigates users to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Enforces authentication, loads user profile, and displays a profile setup form if missing before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/charts/WeeklyPro: Computes and displays a small weekly minutes chart from focus session data using simple bar visuals.
frontend/src/components/focus/PomodoroTi: A 25â€‘minute Pomodoro timer that tracks countdown, handles completion, and saves completed sessions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with sidebar navigation, mobile drawer, top bar, and logout integration.
frontend/src/components/planner/StudyTas: Modal form for creating a study task, handling input, validation, and submitting via addTask mutation.
frontend/src/components/planner/SubjectP: Computes per-subject task completion stats and displays progress cards with percentages.
frontend/src/components/planner/Syllabus: Generates a study plan from syllabus text and date range, then creates tasks via addTask mutation.
frontend/src/components/planner/TaskCale: Builds a calendar for the current month and displays tasks corresponding to each day based on deadlines.
frontend/src/components/planner/TaskList: Task list with subject filtering, completion toggling, and deletion using update and delete mutations.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/RoadmapT: Renders a career roadmap with sections for skills, tools, projects, and high-level journey details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, refetching dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssistantQuota.ts: Calculates remaining AI assistant message quota based on user plan and today's chat count.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend canister calls with React Query hooks for profiles, tasks, dashboard data, chat, and roadmaps.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state synced with localStorage and applies classes to the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with global typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/app/AiAssistantPage.t: Displays the AI assistant chat UI, enforcing usage quotas and enabling message submission and history viewing.
frontend/src/pages/app/CareerRoadmapPage: Provides UI to generate, save, and display a personalized career roadmap with form input and timeline display.
frontend/src/pages/app/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page showing focus score, today's tasks, upcoming exams, and quick stats using fetched dashboard and task data.
Focus tracking page that displays focus session metrics and provides a Pomodoro timer with charts.
frontend/src/pages/app/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page allowing users to view and update profile details, theme preferences, and account options.
Study planner page for viewing, adding, and managing study tasks with list and calendar views plus syllabus planning.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login page enabling users to authenticate via Internet Identity and navigate to signup or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SignupPage.tsx: Signup page that creates a new account using Internet Identity and redirects users to complete setup.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero content, features, and navigation to login/signup.
frontend/src/utils/focusMetrics.ts: Computes daily focus score, streak of consecutive study days, and total study minutes for the week from focus sessions.
frontend/src/utils/localPlanner.ts: Parses syllabus text into topics and distributes them across a date range to generate daily study tasks.
frontend/src/utils/localRoadmapGenerator: Generates a deterministic career roadmap with skills, tools, projects, and internship steps based on degree, job, and timeline.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, theme extensions, custom colors, animations, shadows, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including stack, features, architecture notes, and current build state version.
